挾.definition: (bound form) to clasp under the arm; (bound form) to coerce; (bound form) to harbor (resentment etc); Taiwan pr. [xia2]

挾制.definition: to exploit sb's point of weakness to force them to do one's bidding

挾天子以令天下.pinyin: xie2 tian1 zi3 yi3 ling4 tian1 xia4
挾天子以令天下.definition: (expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control the whole country

挾天子以令諸侯.pinyin: xie2 tian1 zi3 yi3 ling4 zhu1 hou2
挾天子以令諸侯.definition: (expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control his vassals

挾帶.definition: to carry along; to carry on one's person; to carry secretly

挾持.definition: to seize (sb) by the arms; to hold under duress; to abduct
